alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, southwestern Camden and northeastern Charlton Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Homeland, or near Folkston, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Homeland and Kings Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
